root.name: Fate: Undiscovered Realms
root.description: After a victory in Grove, the hero heads to two new settings - Druantia, a forest setting, and Typhon, an artic setting. Each has an outpost for the hero as a base camp, and there is also a Temple of Fate. The hero heads to these places to fight a new evil that he himself has unleashed, being tricked by a stranger exploiting the hero's intentions to help those in need.
